title: "But I main Bard..."
body:
In lobby:
 Summoner X: "Don't ban Bard I main him"
   Me: "He's been out for 4 hours max, no you don't" *bans Bard*
                "You have been returned to matchmaking"
Checked summoner profile afterwards on op.gg, 0 Bard games. Really, when a new champ comes out can you at least try to lean him in bots/normals before going into ranked? Same thing happened next lobby so bugger it I guess I'm playing norms.

replies.body: he could of played him a lot in PBE
ive played in him 8-9 games, only lost 3, carried the rest as Bard.
Just because someone mains a champ, it doesn't necessarily mean they're good with said champ. :P
For me ranked is normals and I love trying champs in ranked it's fun.
auto banning new champs is really odd...until you see how it goes, whats the bet you dont even know if he is good or not....

oh i would've done it anyway just because i don't want the other team getting him either, I do this for every new champ, and really, if the champ hasn't even been out a whole day do you really think anyone is going to be incredibly good with him?

tell that to release xin players. lvl 3 pentakills while towerdiving fountain.

but yeah...till you see if, will you just ban if every time you are FP? like are you still banning thresh since release cos that would make sense....

My rule is that (well, back then, I can cope with normals now) whenever I'm first time a champion, I always play at least 3 Co-Op games first before I go into any PVP at all...
